response.overview: Cadey Mercury's boyfriend broke up with her because she didn't want to have sex with him. Ryan tries his best to cheer her up. Elsa's Jean's friend decides to bail on their plans to go party, so she is to hitchhike. Johnny picks her up, but she feels bad for him because he seems lonely, so she offers to blow him. Obviously it's an offer he can't refuse! Manuel picks up cutie Angel Smalls on his way out of town. She needs to use the washroom, so they stop at his place. When she sees how rich Manuel is, she can't help herself any longer! Pepper is trying to meet her friends at the local pub to celebrate St. Patrick's Day...Danny picks her up and offers her something better, drinks and debauchery at his place instead.
response.title: Sexy Hitchhiker Stories
